text: City car is a term used for an automobile that is shorter than a typical subcompact car, in the A-segment group. They're also referred to as an urban car because they're intended for short distances. The most common city cars are the Fiat 500, the Chevrolet Spark and the Ford Ka (only sold outside the US). == Examples == * Fiat 500 * Fiat Panda * Toyota Aygo * Volkswagen Up! * Kia Picanto * Smart Fortwo * Hyundai i10 * Renault Twingo Category:Automobile body styles
title: City car
